Description.Name: Great Reputation
Description.Details: You have a reputation for success. You attract contractors and employees by the score.

OptionDescription: Great leaders don't need to act tough. Their confidence and humility serve to underscore their toughness. You have a reputation for success. You attract contractors and employees by the score.
BioDescription: Great leaders don't need to act tough. Their confidence and humility serve to underscore their toughness. You have a reputation for success. You attract contractors and employees by the score.
